title: My experience with Ranked on OCE so far.
body:
1. Botlane ragequits.
2. Mid feeds because Zed was banned.
3. Enemy team was salty af.
4. Jungler doesn't have sated by 29 minutes.
5. ADC leaves.
6. Told to kill myself from my jungler for asking for a gank.
7. Guy bans everyone people wanted to play then proceeds to feed.
8. Enemy intentionally feeds.
9. Abusive team.
10. Bot is 0/8 within 15 minutes.

What a great server. I haven't yet had a game that's decent and a fun experience.

replies.body: yeah cause that never happens on other servers.
that list reminds me of bronze 3-5 i was once there but once you improve you will break free from a lot of trolls. PS all servers have that at bronze level
Thats weird,my ranked games are quite enjoyable. I'm often the only salty person. Must be because of ELO difference? Then again,im B3 and my ranked environment is enjoyable,no complaints :)

Like every server you get good and bad games. I find playing during normal peak hours much more enjoyable, you are less likely to get tired kids staying up past their bedtime. Ranked ques 6-12 weekdays and 12-12 weekends  seems to be the most enjoyable and seems to be the best way to avoid bulk smurfs , also you can play blinds at any time and have mixed results.

I like how everyone thinks server "X" is the worst server without having experienced other servers. These things literally happen in every server and gradually decrease as you get into higher leagues. Obviously if you're in a bronze ranked match, there's gonna be way more trolls and feeder than higher leagues since its pretty much the bottom of the barrel and most people don't care about whether or not they lose since they can't be dropped any lower lol. This is the case with every team sport and not just with competitive online games so just stop crying over it and don't play competitively (ranked) if you don't feel you can handle this sort of thing. Also, there's no denying that the a significant percentage of the community is cancer, but there's also no doubt in the fact that there's also many players who are very pleasant and a joy to play with/against (again, just like any other team oriented sport or game).

Some people must be soo unlucky... i cant remember the last tiem there was an afk on my team. I remember getting people that feed or a worse then their lane opposition but that happens no big deal. I have no issues with this server persionally.
I was on this server since it was first released and my main account got banned because this server is actual cancer and  isn't worth your time {{item:3070}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
^this.... im moving to another server next week.
